initiate_password_recovery: Enter Recovery Token. You can find the recovery token in an email that was sent from yourself if password recovery was setup prior to losing access.
disable_password_recovery: Désacter de la récupération du mot de passe
password_changed: Le mot de passe a été modifié
pwd_change_modal: N’oubliez pas votre mot de passe ou vos réponses aux questions de récupération. Ils ne peuvent pas être récupérés!
pin_successfully_changed: Le code PIN a bien été modifié
delete_username_account: Souhaitez-vous supprimer %1$s depuis cet appareil? Cet action va déactiver l'acess avec le Code PIN. Si le multi facteur d'authentification serait réactivé pour ce compte, vous ne devrait plus se connecter pendant 7 jours avec cet appareil sans la réinitialisation du multi facteur d'authentification.
disable_otp_header: Souhaitez- vous vraiment désactiver le multification facteur authentification?
disable_otp_modal_body: Le multi facteurs d’authentification se désactivera au bout de 7 jours si aucune action n’est effectuée par l’utilisateur avec l’appareil authentifié.
email_error_modal: Veuillez régler l'adress Email client qui est connecé à l'OS de votre apreil afin d'envoyer des Tokens à votre adress mail
must_one_lowercase: Doit avoir au moins 1 lettre minuscule
must_one_uppercase: Doit avoir au moins 1 lettre majuscule
terms_one: Je comprends que mes fonds sont en toute sécurité sur cet appareil et non détenus par %s
terms_two: Je reconnais le fait que si je perds l'appareil ou déinstaller l'application, je pourrais seulement récuperer les assets digitaux avec mon identifiant et le mot de passe
terms_three: I understand that if I lose my username and password, %s will not be able to recover my account, unless I set up password recovery
terms_four: I understand that I am responsible for safekeeping of my passwords, private key pairs, PIN, and any other codes to access the software. %s is not responsible if my information is compromised or accessed by a 3rd party where funds are lost
password_desc: The password is used to log in and change sensitive settings. Be sure to write it down!
pin_desc: Your PIN is a 4 digit code used to quickly log back into your account.
recovery_successful: Récupération réussie ! Veuillez changer votre mot de passe et code PIN.
recover_by_username: Veuillez entrer le nom de compte que vous souhaitez récupérer.
recovery_by_username_error: Invalid recovery link or username does not exist
answer_case_sensitive: Les réponses sont sensibles à la casse
answers_four_chanracters: Votre réponse doit comporter au moins 4 caractères
otp_instructions: Connectez-vous à votre compte en utilisant l'appareil vous vous installez le multi facteur d’authentification en suite vous cliquez le réglages > Cliquer sur le multi facteur d’authentification pour trouver le code.
otp_email_body_branded: Please click the link below from a mobile device with %1$s installed to initiate account recovery for username
otp_email_body2: You can also use the Recovery Token displayed below:
otp_email_body3_branded: Enter or copy and paste the recovery token displayed above inside the %1$s app by tapping on Forgot Password at the login screen.
recovery_disabled: Votre mots de passe pour la récuperation a été bien désactivé. Vous pouvez l'activer encore une cois en cliauqant sur la récuperation de mots de passe
recovery_instructions_complete: Pour terminer la configuration de récupération de compte, vous devez enregistrer un token de récupération de compte. Cela sera nécessaire pour récupérer votre compte et votre nom d'utilisateur, et la récupération des réponses. Veuillez entrer votre address mail ci-dessous pour envoyer la récupération de token.
recovery_error: The answers you provided are incorrect.
read_understod_1: J'ai lu, compris et Et je donne mon accord sur les
welcome_advantage_one_description_line1: You’ll choose a username and password.
welcome_advantage_one_description_line2: We’ll use these to encrypt your account.
welcome_advantage_two_description: You have complete control over your digital assets. Not even %s has access to your information.
username_desc: Votre nom d'utilisateur sera obligagoire pour se connecter dans votre compte %s sur cet appareil également les autres appareils.
almost_done: Presque fini! Nous allons écrire vore information de compte
warning_message: If you lose your account information, you’ll lose access to your funds permanently.
login_with_password: Connexion avec un mot de passe
landing_tagline: Un portefeuille cryptomonnaie sécurisé et facile à utiliser pour les actifs numériques de vos Blockchains et Tokens
landing_already_have_account: Vous avez déjà un compte ? Connectez-vous
pin_not_enabled: PIN n'est pas valable pour ce compte
pin_network_error_full_password: You may still log into your account with username and password.
account_locked_for: Compte bloqué pour %1$s encore plus de quelques secondes
password_error: Mot de passe ne correspond pas aux exigences
confirm_password_error: Les mots de passe ne correspondent pas.
username_ascii_error: Il faut uniquement des caractères Ascii
it_would_take_xx_to_crack: Il faudrait %s à casser votre mot de passe
recommend_choosing_a_stronger: Choisissez un mot de passe plus fort
create_account_error_message: An error occurred creating your account. This may have been due to a slow network connection or network interruption. Please retry and if you receive another error that the account already exists, please restart the app and login with your username and password.
otp_reset_modal_message: Two factor authentication (2FA) prevents unauthorized access from other devices, even if your username and password is compromised. You can scan a QR code or type in an authentication code to seamlessly authorize other devices. Would you like to enable 2FA?
otp_authentication_message:
2FA has been enabled. A unique authentication code has been generated. If you lose your phone or uninstall the app, it will take 7 days to disable 2FA and access your account from another device without the following authentication code.

%s
alert_modal_voucher: Login request for new device for account
alert_modal_action: Please log in to approve or deny this alert
alert_scene_message: A new device would like to log in to your account.
alert_scene_message_many: Several new devices would like to log in to your account.
alert_scene_warning: If you did not request this login, your password may have been stolen and you could lose funds. Please deny the request and change your password.
alert_scene_reset_message: Someone is trying to remove 2-factor security from your account.
alert_scene_reset_date: Unless denied, access will be granted on:
otp_scene_header_2fa: This device cannot log in because it does not have the right 2-factor code
otp_scene_header_ip: This device cannot log in due to an unrecognized IP address
otp_scene_approve: Approve this request from another logged-in device
otp_scene_qr: Scan QR code with another logged-in device
otp_scene_wait: Wait until %s when this device will be automatically authorized to log in
otp_repair_header_2fa_branded: This device cannot sync with the %1$s servers because it does not have the right 2-factor code
otp_repair_header_ip_branded: This device cannot sync with the %1$s servers due to an unrecognized IP address
qr_modal_message: Scan this QR code with another device logged into your account:
notifications_and_refresh_permissions_br: Please enable Notifications and Background App Refresh for account security. %1$s will notify you if other devices attempt to access your account and will allow you to accept or reject access.
refresh_permission_branded: Please enable Background App Refresh for account security. %1$s will notify you if other devices attempt to access your account and will allow you to accept or reject access.
notifications_permissions_branded: Please enable Notifications for account security. %1$s will notify you if other devices attempt to access your account and will allow you to accept or reject access.
change_recovery_question1: What is the anniversary date with your first spouse?
change_recovery_question2: What is the birthdate of the maid/matron of honor at your wedding?
change_recovery_question3: What is the birthdate of your childhood best friend?
change_recovery_question4: What was your favorite brand of clothing in high school?
change_recovery_question5: What is the birthdate of your favorite grand parent?
change_recovery_question6: What is the birthdate of your favorite niece or nephew?
change_recovery_question7: What was the first address you remember living in?
change_recovery_question8: What was your address in college?
change_recovery_question9: What was your maternal grandfather's first and last name?
change_recovery_question10: What was your maternal grandmother's first and last name?
change_recovery_question11: What is the street address of the first home you remember?
change_recovery_question12: Name the make, model, and year of your dream car?
change_recovery_question13: Who is your childhood sports hero?
